General.Name: UD Electronic
General.Description: U.D. Electronic Corp. researches, manufactures, and sells electronic components and materials, connectors, and products worldwide. It also develops machinery and automatic equipment, as well as engages in the international trading business. The company offers RJ45 integrated connector module and pure connectors; SFF solutions, including SFP, SFP+, SFP28, QSFP-DD, QSFP+, and QSFP28; LAN filters, such as transformers and signal pulse transformers; high-speed cables comprising type C, external, and internal cables; dongles; surge protectors; and silicone parts. Its products are used in networking, PC, consumer electronics, automotive, and surveillance system applications. U.D. Electronic Corp. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 13, Neixi Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338012
